I am not a wargamer but have painted 15mm and 25mm figures for display. One
company that I have found very useful (and helpful) are "Village Green".
They produce a series of resin cast "Samurai" bits...

Check it out:
                        http://www.apollo948.freeserve.co.uk/VG.html

Regards
                            Rod
